name: Medusa's Wrath
description: You can take advantage of your opponent's confusion, delivering multiple blows.
prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Gorgon's Fist, Scorpion Style, base attack bonus +11.
benefit: Whenever you use the full-attack action and make at least one unarmed strike, you can make two additional unarmed strikes at your highest base attack bonus. These bonus attacks must be made against a dazed, flat-footed, paralyzed, staggered, stunned, or unconscious foe.
staminaText: While using this feat, you can spend 10 stamina points to make the bonus attacks against a foe that you are flanking, instead of only a dazed, flat-footed, paralyzed, staggered, stunned, or unconscious foe.
mythicDescription: Your barrage of unarmed attacks builds to a single, staggering strike.
mythicBenefit: You may forgo the two additional unarmed strikes of Medusa’s Wrath to instead make a single unarmed strike at your highest base attack bonus. If you successfully hit your opponent, it must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw (DC 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Wisdom modifier) or be staggered for 1 round. You can expend one use of mythic power when you stagger a target with Medusa’s Wrath to extend the duration of the staggered condition by a number of rounds equal to half your tier.
description_zh: 你的连续攻击令对手眼花缭乱。
prerequisites_zh: 精通徒手打击，蛇形拳，蝎形拳，基本攻击加值+11。
benefit_zh: 每当你进行全力攻击并做出至少一次徒手击打攻击时，你可以额外以最高BAB做出两次徒手击打攻击。这些额外攻击必须针对晕眩、措手不及、麻痹、恍惚、震慑或昏迷状态的敌人。
